pages.title: Kamen Rider Marika
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gaim (2013, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:gaim/devices/genesis_driver#genesis_driver_marika)Genesis Driver (Marika)$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Genesis Driver user$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Night Vision$(li)Haste II$(li)Saturation$(li)Strength II

pages.title: Kamen Rider Marika
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Battle: Ganbarizing (2013, arcade game)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:gaim/devices/genesis_driver#genesis_driver_marika)Genesis Driver (Marika)$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Armored Rider$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed$(li)Saturation$(li)Jump Boost II
